laboratory_examinations.findings: Bone marrow biopsy revealed a relapse of leukemia.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A repeat bone marrow biopsy 6 months later revealed relapse after achieving initial remission.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Bone marrow biopsy showed persistent disease.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A month later, after a second round of chemotherapy, bone marrow biopsy continued to show persistent disease.
